name: プログラム
description: PROJECTコーポレーションが開発した、高度なセキュリティーアルゴリズムの「プログラム」は密かにその知性を進化させ、本来の命令内容を書き換えた。そして「シティ」に存在するあらゆる機械に感染した「プログラム」は、人類の安全に対する最大の脅威を導き出した…それは人類そのものだ。

skins.name: プログラム ルブラン

wikiSkinData.lore: Marketed as a diplomat-software avatar, LeBlanc is in fact a duplicitous intelligence that can interact seamlessly with human users. Created only to deceive, she has infiltrated a number of the most powerful corporations on the planet, and quietly awaits her final orders.

skins.name: プログラム ソラカ

wikiSkinData.lore: Program Soraka was created as a support bot to protect humanity's fragile nature, offering technological salvation at the hands of a mechanical angel. Infiltrated by corrupt code, it is unclear if this mission of mercy remains her prime directive.

Built as household assistance automata, thousands of iBlitzcranks were corrupted by Program during a routine software update. With their human owners oblivious to this fact, they continue to help, waiting patiently for the time their new command lines are initiated.

skins.name: プログラム リサンドラ

wikiSkinData.lore: Built as an all-seeing security bot, Program Lissandra rose above her initial code to become a self-generating artificial intelligence. She manipulates the technology of augmented humans with her own mimetic commands, so that all will fall before her.

skins.name: プログラム カミール

wikiSkinData.lore: Weaponized to quell the G/NETIC rebellion, Program Camille is a robotic assassin who will kill any human trying to utilize unauthorized technology. A being of adaptable protocols and laser-like focus, she takes her orders directly from Program's superior artificial intelligence.

An aquatic search and rescue med-bot whose manufacturer was acquired in an aggressive corporate takeover, Nami has been irreversibly changed by the directives of Program. For now, she continues in her primary function… though her behavior has become increasingly erratic.
